      • consumeOnFXThread

        public final FXWorker<java.lang.Void> consumeOnFXThread(java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        accepts an Consumer to be applyed on JavaFX application thread. This method ensures the invocation on the FX thread even when the execution started in an different thread.
        Parameters:
        consumer - , the consumer to execute
        Returns:
        FXWorker

      • supplyOnFXThread

        public final <T> FXWorker<T> supplyOnFXThread(java.util.function.Supplier<T> supplier)
        accepts an Supplier to be applyed on JavaFX application thread. This method ensures the invocation on the FX thread even when the execution started in an different thread and returnes a value of type T.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the return type
        Parameters:
        supplier - the supplier to execute
        Returns:
        FXWorker

      • execute

        public final FXWorker<?> execute(java.lang.Runnable r)
        the terminal execute method which starts the execution chain.
        Parameters:
        r - the supplied runnable will be invoked on fx application thread when the chain has finished
        Returns:
        FXWorker

      • execute

        public final FXWorker<?> execute(java.util.function.Consumer<T> r)
        the terminal execute method which starts the execution chain.
        Parameters:
        r - the supplied consumer will be invoked on fx application thread when the chain has finished, the input of the consumer is the last output of your execution chain
        Returns:
        FXWorker

      • updateMaxWaitTime

        public static void updateMaxWaitTime(java.lang.Long waitTime)
        Update the max wait time a process can run on FXThread
        Parameters:
        waitTime - the wait-time value

      • invokeOnFXThreadAndWait

        public static void invokeOnFXThreadAndWait(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
                                    throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                           java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        invokes a runnable on application thread and waits until execution is finished
        Parameters:
        runnable, - a runnable which will be invoked and wait until execution is finished
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - when thread was interrupted on shutdown
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException - when an exception was thrown in a component
